text: John B. Vasconcellos Jr. (May 11, 1932 - May 24, 2014) was an American politician and psychologist. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He represented Silicon Valley as a member of the California State Assembly for 30 years and a California State Senator for 8 years. Vasconcellos died in San Jose, California from multiple organ failure, aged 82. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:American psychologists Category:Politicians from San Jose, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States
title: John Vasconcellos
